text:
Created attachment 32423
hs_err_pid.log

Hi 
We are using Apache tomcat 6.0.39 with jdk1.6.0_45.But sometimes the JVM crashes with the generation of a core dump.The OS we are using is Solaris10.
Could you please help us to find the root cause of this issue.

Please find the error file in the attachment.

Also getting the below error in the logs.

creator: abilash.pankajakshan@ibsplc.com
markt@apache.org
text: That is a JVM crash with no sign of any Tomcat involvement. You need to obtain support from your JVM vendor.
